title: Boutique Foodie Escape in Italy’s Wine Country
description: Indulge in a gourmet escape at the boutique Duchessa Margherita in Vicoforte, Italy. Located near the stunning Langhe region - famous for its truffles, cheese and wine - this peaceful boutique property in the region of Piedmont is the ideal place for your next foodie adventure. Tantalise the tastebuds with delectable inclusions such as a daily breakfast buffet spread, a regional three-course dinner for two, a wine-tasting experience plus a bottle of red or white wine and a gourmet goodie bag at check-out, featuring an assortment of Italian delicacies. Buon appetito!
offer_address: Via S. Rocco, 29, 12080 Vicoforte CN, Italy
